comment.body:
> Thanks for checking, could you please send the full address of the resource to which stealth should not be applied? These domains unlock too much, on my mind Maybe something like:
> 
> ```
> @@||cdn.idevbase.com/static/$stealth,domain=ohttps.com
> @@||ohttps.com^$stealth
> ```

coolproblem solvedThanks

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dkGs7_xdxHo](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DdkGs7_xdxHo) ### Comment > The user rules are initialized every time I run the browser, so I'm backing up the ad filter for this program, reinstalling it, and retrieving the settings to use it. However, the advertising blocking effect seems to be worse than before the reinstallation, and the user rule initialization bug still remains. Please fix it as soon as possible. There were nearly 1000 user rules, so I could have a pleasant Internet life, but THANK YOU SO MUCH for letting me know the importance of backup like this :( ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/mfgu7jgizlcok4ss4o4k88o0o0s8kccbkx9tr7stls.png?nc=1)
